Checkbox.name: obj_HangarSale_RePrice
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["If this is checked, ComBot will update prices on current orders if they no longer match ComBot's estimates based on the selected price mode."]

Checkbox.name: obj_HangarSale_Sell
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["When this is checked, ComBot will place new sell orders based on your selected price mode."]

Checkbox.name: MoveRefine
Checkbox.Text: Move items to be refined to active ship
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["When this is checked, ComBot will move items to your active ship when the items are worth more when reprocessed into minerals."]

Checkbox.name: Logout
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["When this is checked, ComBot will log out of the game after performing one cycle."]

Slider.name: obj_HangarSale_UndercutPercent
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["Use this slider to determine the percentage to undercut items. ComBot will use the smaller between percentage and straight ISK value."]

Slider.name: obj_HangarSale_UndercutValue
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["Use this slider to determine the straight ISK value to undercut items. ComBot will use the smaller between percentage and straight ISK value."]

ComboBox.name: Duration
ComboBox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_HangarSale_Frame@ComBot_HangarSale]:SetText["This option determines the duration in days ComBot will put on sell orders."]
